description: Write a function that checks if a `hostname` ends with any suffix in the `internal_tlds` list (case-insensitive). `internal_tlds` is a NULL-terminated array. Example (Match): hostname_has_tld("db.internal", [".local", ".internal"]) -> 1. Example (No Match): hostname_has_tld("db.com", [".local", ".internal"]) -> 0.
